com.youama.nexus.parser.collector

Interface ICollector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Collector, LinkCollector, TextCollector

    public interface ICollector
    Interface for Collector classes. Collectors can collect specified data from a source and they can retrieve them. The parsing logic is protected or private and they are unique for each kind of Collectors.
    Since:
    2015.07.11.
    Author:
    David Belicza - 87.bdavid@gmail.com

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<BasicItem> getItems()
      It retrieves the collected, parsed data in a list of objects.
      void parse()
      Initiate the default parsing process.
      void parseByRule(int rule)
      Initiate the selected parsing process.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        void parse()
        Initiate the default parsing process. This method has to be implemented in a non-abstract class.

      • parseByRule

        void parseByRule(int rule)
        Initiate the selected parsing process. This method has to be implemented in a non-abstract class.
        Parameters:
        rule - The ID of the rule.

      • getItems

        List<BasicItem> getItems()
        It retrieves the collected, parsed data in a list of objects. This method has to be implemented on abstract level.
        Returns:
        The value from the property.
